entry.title: Ubuntu e la programmazione occasionale
entry.summary:
Summary

[EuroPython 2011] Paolo Sammicheli - 21 June 2011 in "Track Italiana Big Mac"

Description

In questo talk, mosteremo i tool e l'infastruttura che rende molto semplice la creazione di progetti Python in Ubunut, e la loro distribuzione a milioni di utenti. Verranno mostrati vari tool: Launchpad, Quickly e i PPA (personal package archiving).

entry.title: Ubuntu and the opportunistic programming
entry.summary:
Summary

[EuroPython 2011] Paolo Sammicheli - 20 June 2011 in "Track Tagliatelle"

Description

We will show the tools and the infrastructure that makes easy creating own python project in Ubuntu and distributing it to millions of users. It will be shown several tools: Launchpad, Quickly and and the Ubuntu's PPA (personal package archiving).
